name: Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport
address: 6225 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Offering a free 24-hour transfer service to LAX, Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport features spacious rooms with mid-century modern design and free WiFi. Venice Beach is 15 minutes’ drive away. An outdoor pool is available as well. A 55-inch cable HDTV is offered in each air-conditioned room at this full service hotel. Soundproof windows offer 24-hour comfort. Guest rooms also include a refrigerator, a coffee machine and a safe. Bathrooms have granite counter-tops, marble floors, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The restaurant onsite, unity la, offers a restaurant, open market, and a bar. The best of LA's ethnic neighborhoods and diverse communities come to life for our guests. unity la features a 24-hour open market and a unique offering of eclectic and savory choices. unity la is located on the lobby level. Guests can work out in the fitness center at Hyatt Regency Los Angeles International Airport. Concierge services are available. This hotel is within 15 minutes’ drive of Marina Del Rey. Hollywood is 12 mi away. Westchester Golf Course is 2.5 mi away from this hotel.

name: The Hollywood Roosevelt
description: Located in Los Angeles, a 3-minute walk from Dolby Theater, The Hollywood Roosevelt has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and organizing tours for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at The Hollywood Roosevelt have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking. There's an in-house bar and guests can also use the business area. Capitol Records Building is a 19-minute walk from The Hollywood Roosevelt, while Hollywood Bowl is 1.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles
address: 404 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Set in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles radiates an elegance that has attracted U.S. Presidents, dignitaries, and beloved stars of TV and film. The hotel welcomes travelers visiting Southern California with a soaring atrium, world class amenities, and an unforgettable experience. Stay on top of your fitness in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and go for a swim in the newly renovated outdoor pool. Indulge in inspiring cuisine at our hotel restaurants including Lakeview Bistro and our award-winning LA Prime steakhouse. Recharge in our well-appointed, pet-friendly rooms and suites. Every room features our Heavenly® Beds, mini-refrigerators, HDTVs, large work desks, free Wi-Fi, and floor-to-ceiling windows with impressive city views. Suites offer separate living rooms, dining/meeting tables, wet bars, and marble bathrooms. With 166,553 sq. ft. of elevated indoor and outdoor venues, event planners can organize anything from lavish weddings to board meetings.Marriott

name: Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown
description: At Hotel Indigo® Los Angeles Downtown, you’ll experience the city’s thriving creativity, urban vibe and unique multiculturalism both inside and out. With convenient access to a variety of entertainment, dining and shopping options, including the iconic L.A. Live complex, Crypto.com Arena and The Arts & Jewelry District. Throughout the hotel, you’ll find décor with floral accents that recall La Fiesta de las Flores, an event that has showcased the city’s international melting pot since 1894. With neon lights that mirror world-famous L.A. nightlife, 18 Social features sweeping views of the dazzling lights that illuminate Los Angeles every night. In your room, cityscapes fill the walls, while our spa-style bathrooms were inspired by pre-Hollywood glamour and the jewelry that accessorized Golden Age cinema. No other hotel in Los Angeles provides such an immersive experience. Come and create YOUR LA Story.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: citizenM Los Angeles Downtown
address: 361 South Spring Street, Los Angeles, CA 90013
description: Conveniently located in the center of Los Angeles, citizenM Los Angeles Downtown provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a shared lounge. One mile from LA Union Station and 1.5 miles from Microsoft Theater, the property has a restaurant and a bar. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located 1.5 miles from Staples Center. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms in citizenM Los Angeles Downtown are equipped with free toiletries and an iPad. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Ironing facilities, and a business center are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Dodger Stadium is 3.7 miles from citizenM Los Angeles Downtown, while LA Memorial Coliseum is 3.9 miles away.

name: Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City
address: 555 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608-1001
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: LA Hotel Worker Protection Ordinance Fee, LA Tourism Marketing District Assessment, and California Tourism Assessment. FOUR-DIAMOND SERVICE IN THE HEART OF THE ENTERTAINMENT DISTRICT The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is a 24-story glistening hotel high on the hilltop located at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal CityWalk. Our hotel conveys the style and feel of contemporary California living in a relaxed resort setting and adds a host of modern comforts and conveniences. The hotel's ongoing commitment to superior service and exceptional standards of excellence earned us the coveted AAA Four Diamond Award, Smart Meetings Platinum Choice Award and Successful Meetings Pinnacle Award. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, guests can relax in a spacious guestroom with magnificent panoramic views of the Hollywood hills and all the major studios including Universal Studios, Disney Studios, Warner Brothers Studios and NBC Studios to name a few. With stylish furnishings and your comfort in mind, each room is designed with thoughtful business amenities such as high-speed Internet access, two-line phones, safes, and mini-bars. Savor an eclectic blend of culinary delights including California, Continental and Chinese cuisines at our award-winning Cafe Sierra, voted California's Number One Seafood & Prime Rib Buffet. Unwind with a book in our Lobby Lounge while enjoying your favorite cordial or revitalize in our state-of-the-art fitness facility featuring Precor equipment. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, our team is committed to make your stay a memorable one. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Nearby Points of Interest Universal Studios, CityWalk & Gibson Amphitheater - Adjacent, Red Line Train - 0.1 miles, NBC - 0.5 miles, Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater - 3 miles, Hollywood Bowl - 2 Miles, CBS Studios - 3 miles, ABC Broadcasting/Disney Studios - 3 miles, NBC Studios - 3 miles, St. Joseph Hospital - 3 miles, Warner Brothers Studios - 3 miles, Walk of Fame - 3 miles, CNN/Turner Broadcasting - 4 miles, Forest Lawn - 4 miles, Equestrian Center - 4 miles, Grauman's Chinese Theater - 3 miles, Gene Autry Western Museum - 5 Miles, Capitol Records - 5 miles, Los Angeles Zoo - 6 miles, Paramount Studios - 5 miles, Melrose Ave - 6 Miles, Nestle Corporation - 8 miles, Dreamworks SKG - 7 miles, Griffith Park Observatory - 7 miles, Staples Center - 10 miles, Los Angeles Convention Center - 11 miles, LA Live & Nokia Theater - 11 miles, Disney Center for the Performing Arts - 10 miles, Rodeo Drive - 15 miles, California Beaches - 21 miles, Queen Mary Long Beach - 35 miles, Six Flags Magic Mountain - 26 miles, Knott's Berry Farm - 31 miles, Disneyland - 36 miles. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Location The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is located in the heart of the ''Entertainment District'' of Los Angeles, California at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood, Universal CityWalk and Gibson Amphitheater, two minutes to most of the major Hollywood Studios, five minutes to Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater, Hollywood Bowl and Burbank Airport, 10 minutes to Glendale, 15 minutes to Pasadena and Rose Bowl, 20 minutes to Downtown Los Angeles, Los Angeles Convention Center, Staples Center and the new Nokia Theater and LA Live, and 45 minutes to Los Angeles International Airport. Other nearby attractions and hot spots include Griffith Park Observatory, Greek Theater, Autry Western Heritage Museum, Magic Mountain, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills, and the Southern California beaches. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Rooms and Amenities Our spacious guest rooms and nine suites, each with expansive offering panoramic views, make the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City stand above other area hotels. Features include such welcome amenities as high-speed IntHilton

name: Intercontinental Los Angeles Downtown, An IHG Hotel
description: Located in one of the most revered and iconic building on the West Coast — the Wilshire Grand — InterContinental Los Angeles Downtown is renowned for its world-class dining, sublime rooms, and architectural mastery. Arrive through our lavish 70th floor Sky Lobby for breathtaking views of downtown Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Sip crafted cocktails at our rooftop bar and enjoy our proximity to The Grammy Museum, Walt Disney Concert Hall, The Broad Museum, and Universal Studios.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Huntley Santa Monica Beach
description: Located less than 5 minutes walk to 3rd Street Promenade and the Santa Monica State Beach path, this Santa Monica modern beach-side hotel features a restaurant, bar, and lounge. Select rooms provide ocean views. Each room provides a flat-screen TV, bathrobes, slippers and spa toiletries at Huntley Santa Monica Beach. Select rooms feature a spa bath. Featuring a rooftop view of the ocean and coastline, The Penthouse restaurant, bar and lounge is styled in elegant white drapes, lavish white chairs and white on white linens. Dinner is served daily and brunch is served on the weekend. A happy hour menu is offered Monday-Friday at the Huntley. A 24-hour reception, concierge and room services are provided for guests at the Huntley. Dry cleaning, shoe shine, and airport transfers are also offered with an additional surcharge. Venice Beach is 10 minutes’ drive away from the Huntley Santa Monica Beach. Hollywood, California is just 12 miles away from Huntley Santa Monica Beach.

name: The Garland
description: Close to Universal City, home of more than 50 shops and restaurants, this hotel in North Hollywood, California offers contemporary amenities such as free wireless internet and an on-site restaurant. An outdoor pool and hot tub is also available to guests. All rooms at The Garland include a private balcony, an LCD flat-screen TV, a refrigerator, and a coffee machine with coffees and teas. Guests at The Garland can work out in the fitness center. There is also an on-site bar available for guests. The Front Yard at The Garland serves Californian cuisine. Guests can also buy a cup of Seattle's Best Coffee at The Front Yard. In the evening, visitors can enjoy a drink on the outdoor patio at the Lobby Bar or the Lounge. Universal Studios Hollywood is 1.1 mi from The Garland, while the Hollywood Sign is 2.8 mi away. The Los Angeles Airport is 25 mi away.

name: Eurostars Langford
description: Located in a historic building, Eurostars Langford offers modern amenities. A mini-bar and a 48-inch flat-screen TV are provided in each room. A private bathroom with a shower, bathrobes (by request) and free toiletries is included. A 24-hour front desk, concierge service, and private parking are available at the property for guests' convenience. External Dry cleaning Company. Nearby, Bayside Marketplace is 2953 feet from the hotel, while Bayfront Park is 1969 feet away. AmericanAirlines Arena is located 0.8 mi away from the property, and Miami city center is 2625 feet away.

name: Viajero Miami
description: Centrally located opposite the beach and 5 minutes' walk from the restaurants and bars of Ocean Drive, this boutique hotel in South Beach features 3 pools in a courtyard. The accommodations at Viajero Miami, formerly The Stiles Hotel, are colorful with a bohemian décor. They are each furnished with a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock with an iPod docking station. A concierge service and 24-hour reception are available for convenience at Viajero Miami. Complimentary coffee and tea is available in the lobby 24 hours a day. Miami city center is 10 minutes’ drive away from Viajero Miami and the Miami International Airport is 20 minutes' drive from the resort.

name: citizenM Miami Brickell
description: Well situated in the center of Miami, citizenM Miami Brickell provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness center. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a restaurant and a bar. The property has a 24-hour front desk, a business center and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms in citizenM Miami Brickell are equipped with free toiletries and an iPad. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Bayfront Park Station is a 16-minute walk from citizenM Miami Brickell, while Bayside Market Place is 1.3 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: Hilton Miami Downtown
description: Enjoy panoramic views of Biscayne Bay from the recently renovated Hilton Miami Downtown hotel. Discover miles of white sandy beaches and South Beach entertainment only minutes away. The Hilton Miami Downtown hotel is conveniently located only 15 minutes from Miami International Airport (MIA) and five minutes from the Port of Miami. Experience all that the Downtown Miami performing arts district has to offer including Coconut Grove and the famous Miracle Mile, Miami Beach, Bayside Marketplace, South Beach, Wynwood Arts District, and Kaseya Center. Plunge into the outdoor rooftop pool and admire the Miami skyline view. Enjoy your favorite frozen cocktail or a casual lunch poolside at CityVu Pool Bar. Brisa Bistro offers exotic cuisine with an international influence. Hold your next conference or business meeting at the Hilton Miami Downtown hotel in 45, 000 sq. ft. of function space including one of the largest ballrooms (17, 000 sq. ft.) in the Miami area. Featuring the latest technology and flexible space, the Hilton Miami Downtown hotel is also ideally located for several major company offices.Hilton

name: Hotel Victor
description: This luxury South Beach hotel features a pool overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. The rooms include flat-screen TVs and MP3 docking stations. Modern bathrooms with bathrobes are standard in the rooms at Hotel Victor South Beach. The rooms also include plush white bedding and windows with tropical views. Guests can relax in the hammam spa, which is a Turkish style bath house with massage services and other spa treatments. The property also offers bike rentals to explore South Beach. Hotel Victor South Beach is 5 minutes' walk of the Art Deco District. Lincoln Road Mall is within 5 minutes' drive of the property. The Versace Mansion is adjacent to the property.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral
description: Your modern and vibrant DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral, FL is located in the heart of Dorals' bustling business district. Featuring local photos of Miami that embraces the culture and area, your full-service DoubleTree by Hilton Miami Doral, FL was designed with all of the modern comforts that today's traveler expects. This brand new hotel is just nine miles from Miami International Airport, two miles from Dolphin Mall and within walking distance from Miami International Mall. Downtown Miami, South Beach, the Art Deco District and Lincoln Road are all within easy reach. Our hotel offers a local shuttle within a five mile radius. We’ll greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Feel at home in a guest room with complimentary WiFi, satellite TV, a mini-fridge, ergonomic workspace, and plenty of outlets to charge your devices. Our suites offer a separate living area, larger bathroom and second TV. A wealth of amenities await you, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, outdoor pool and terrace with bar. Dine at Rocio with its creative cuisine for all taste buds, or enjoy your favorite beer or cocktail Antojitos Lounge. Grab a snack, sandwich and other fresh selections at Made Market. Our hotel features meeting space for any special event or conference and can accommodate up to 275 people.Hilton

name: The Palms Hotel & Spa
description: This oceanfront hotel on Miami Beach has an outdoor pool in a tropical garden setting. Rooms feature Chromecast streaming. Select rooms have a separate seating areas. All rooms at the Palms Hotel & Spa have flat-screen TVs. Guests will find a work desk and ironing facilities, as well as BeeKind® toiletries. Views from the rooms include the hotel gardens, the cityscape or the Atlantic Ocean beaches. The on-site The Palms AVEDA Spa offers a variety of body care services. There’s Wi-Fi in the guest business center and throughout the hotel. Along with the pool, the hotel has a fitness center and is adjacent to the city pedestrian boardwalk. Guests can enjoy al fresco dining at Essensia Restaurant, which features sustainably-sourced ingredients prepared to showcase seasonal favorites. The hotel’s Tiki Bar provides poolside drinks. Guests can also use on-site beach amenities like lounge chairs and towels, along with food and beverage service. The Palms Hotel & Spa is one mile from the Julia Tuttle Causeway on Interstate 195. The Bayshore Municipal Golf Course is 2 miles from the hotel and Miami International Airport is 12 miles away.

name: citizenM Miami Worldcenter
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 351 guestrooms featuring iPads and LED televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a communal living room. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. Property Location With a stay at citizenM Miami Worldcenter, you'll be centrally located in Miami, just a 4-minute walk from Miami-Dade Arena and 6 minutes by foot from Bayside Marketplace. This 4-star hotel is 2 mi (3.2 km) from PortMiami and 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Ocean Drive. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at canteenM serving guests of citizenM Miami Worldcenter. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Resort fee: USD 22.6 per accommodation, per night The resort fee includes:Beach access Beach loungers Beach towels Pool access We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately USD 21.75 per person Late check-out fee: USD 69 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation This property accepts credit cards and debit cards; cash is not accepted This property reserves the right to pre-authorize the guest's credit card prior to arrival. Onsite parties or group events are strictly prohibited Long-term renters welcome This property uses wind and solar energy, plus eco-friendly cleaning products Noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed Safety features at this property include a smoke detector Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Guests planning to arrive outside of normal check-in hours will receive an email with check-in instructions and key retrieval information. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. The credit card used to book the reservation must be presented by the cardholder at check-in along with matching photo identification. All guests are required to present a valid government-issued ID card at check-in Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available Noise-free rooms not guaranteed Events/parties not allowed LGBTQ friendly Essential workers only - NO Property is not currently implementing any enhanced cleaning measures Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels

name: East Miami
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Miami. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and an express check-in and check-out feature. East Miami features an around the clock reception, as well as a concierge and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers luggage storage, a safe and room service. The hotel also has its very own gym, BEAST. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature ironing facilities, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Quinto La Huella, the in-house restaurant, serves lunch and dinner and offers South American meals. Lunch are served daily at Domain. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Sugar. Miami's attractions, such as Icon Brickell, 701 Brickell Avenue and Plaza on Brickell, are within a 10-minute walk of East Miami. There are also a variety of popular restaurants serving local and international cuisine in the surrounding area.Revato

name: The Elser Hotel Miami
description: Located in Miami, a 6-minute walk from American Airlines Arena, The Elser Hotel Miami provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is a 3-minute walk from Bayside Market Place, and within 500 yards of the city center. At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Elser Hotel Miami has certain rooms with city views, and rooms contain a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. At The Elser Hotel Miami you'll find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. At the hotel guests are welcome to use a hot tub. Guests at The Elser Hotel Miami will be able to enjoy activities in and around Miami, like cycling. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near The Elser Hotel Miami include Bayfront Park, Bayfront Park Station and Adrienne Arsht Center for the Performing Arts. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.8 miles from the hotel.

name: 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection
description: Located in Miami Beach, a 4-minute walk from Miami Beach, 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The property has a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. New World Center is 4.1 miles from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from 6080 Design Hotel by Eskape Collection.

name: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
description: Located in South Beach, Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Loews Miami Beach Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Loews Miami Beach Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Miami Beach (FL) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Godfrey Hotel Boston
description: No description found

name: citizenM Boston North Station
description: Attractively located in Boston, citizenM Boston North Station has air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business center. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some have city views. The rooms in citizenM Boston North Station are equipped with free toiletries and an iPad. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boston North Station, TD Garden and Freedom Trail. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.1 miles from citizenM Boston North Station.

name: Yotel Boston
description: YOTEL Boston offers comfortable accommodation and is a brief walk from Courthouse Bus Station. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan sightseeing trips with the assistance of the tour desk. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. They all offer heating, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Those staying at YOTEL Boston can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for a drink. The hotel is within walking distance of Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Long Wharf Boston and New England Aquarium. It is within a 20-minute stroll of South Station, which allows convenient access in and around Boston.Revato

name: Revere Hotel Boston Common
description: Located in downtown Boston, this redesigned boutique hotel is within a 1640 feet radius from attractions like Boston Common and Newbury Street. It features walls decorated with local arts and offers a rooftop terrace with views of the city and Back Bay. Each room at Revere Hotel Boston Common also features a 55" flat-screen HDTV, Cuisinart coffee maker and plush bedding. Free Wi-Fi is available. Guests can work out in the 24-hour fitness center. Dining options include the A la Carte breakfast, available for a surcharge. Rooftop@Revere is a seasonal rooftop venue where guests can enjoy a cocktail. Revere Hotel Boston Common is 5.3 mi away from Logan International Airport and 2.2 mi away from Fenway Park. Boston Public Garden is 984 feet away.

name: Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston
description: Located 558 feet away from Post Office Square in Boston's Financial District, this hotel is 1804 feet away from the Orpheum Theater. It features an on-site restaurant and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen TV and iPod docking station are included in the guest rooms at Club Quarters Hotel Faneuil Hall, Boston. They are furnished with picture windows and a hardwood desk. In the lounge of Boston Club Quarters, guests can relax with a cup of coffee in front of the fireplace. The Elephant & Castle Pub and Restaurant features a range of British dishes and North American favorites. The on-site gym features floor-to-ceiling mirrors and a mounted TV. A business center is located off of the lobby. Club Quarters Boston is 919 feet from the Downtown Crossing Market and 2133 feet from Fanueil Hall and Quincy Market.

name: Boston Omni Parker House Hotel
description: On the Freedom Trail and a short walk from Boston Common, this luxury historic hotel features a full-service restaurant, a 24-hour business center, and WiFi. Thirteen historic sites from the Freedom Trail are in close proximity. The rooms at the Boston Omni Parker House Hotel have a flat-screen cable TV and an MP3 dock. Plush bathrobes, a coffee maker and ironing facilities are included. Parker’s Restaurant serves local specialties including Boston cream pie and the Parker House Roll. The Last Hooray offers a light fare, specialty cocktails and a large selection of brand whiskey. The hotel has a 24-hour fitness center and a map of local jogging trails. A backpack full of games and activities can be requested for children. The Omni Parker House is 2.7 mi from the Fenway Park and Logan International Airport is 4 mi away.

name: Hilton Boston Logan Airport
description: The airport's only connected and AAA Four Diamond hotel. Hilton Boston Logan Airport is located just two miles to downtown, connecting you to it all. Experience the convenience of being in your room in minutes, whether walking via directly connected, climate-controlled walkways or using our 24-hour courtesy shuttle. Complimentary shuttle also provides service to the subway, car rental facility, and water taxi. Text or call 617-681-8899 to request a ride. Just 10 minutes from Boston's key destinations and iconic neighborhoods including the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, Hynes Center, Sea Port, and North-End. Located in a park-like setting, the hotel offers guests a unique vantage point of the Boston city skyline or aeronautical views from our well-appointed guest rooms. Each of our relaxing guest rooms feature triple-pane windows and lush bedding for a restful night's stay. From hearty breakfasts to light bites, our hotel provides innovative dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients. Looking for a pick-me-up? Café Presto offers Starbucks coffee, freshly baked pastries, and a variety of to-go options during the day as well as evening beer and wine options, while Connolly's Publik House believes in quality food and drink in a relaxed atmosphere. Stay connected with AAA Four Diamond Amenities for personal success on the road, including full-service dining options, room service, a grab-and-go cafe, Fitness Center, indoor pool, Digital Check-in and Digital Key, and 24-hour guest assistance via text. Create meaningful connections and engage attendees with over 30,000 square feet of space including two pillar-less ballrooms, spacious foyers for networking, sophisticated, media-ready boardrooms, and multi-purpose breakout rooms. Our unique indoor/outdoor catering spaces are the perfect back drop to design an incredible event experience any time of year.Hilton

name: Seaport Hotel Boston
description: Located on the waterfront in the bustling Seaport District, the AAA Four Diamond Seaport Boston Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city and harbor views and incredibly convenient access to all major points of interest. Seaport Boston Hotels gracious and accommodating staff provides unparalleled service, and the hotels innovative amenities, including complimentary wireless internet access, service-inclusive policy and complimentary use of Wave Health & Fitness are sure to delight.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston
description: Located in the heart of Downtown Boston, this Hyatt is a short walk from shopping and dining at historic Faneuil Hall. Guests can work up a sweat in the fitness center or grab a bite to eat at the on-site restaurant. Complimentary WiFi is provided for all guests. Boston Common is a 7 minutes' walk from the hotel. Rooms feature a 55-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels. A refrigerator and coffee maker are provided as well. Amenities such as Bluetooth speakers and blackout curtains are offered as well. Guests will appreciate the convenience of in-room dining. Business travelers will enjoy the business center and meeting facilities. The Lobby Bar offers handmade cocktails. Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum is 1969 feet from Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston, while Quincy Market is a 10-minute walk away. Logan Airport is 3.7 mi from the property.

name: Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport
description: Located in Boston, 1.6 miles from Carson Beach, Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or a vegetarian breakfast. The property has an in-house hot tub, hairdresser's and business center. Popular points of interest near Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport include Boston Convention Exhibitors Center, Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum and Boston South Station. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.1 miles from the hotel.

name: Encore Boston Harbor
description: Located in Everett, Encore Boston Harbor Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Everett (MA). The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like 24-hour room service, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer flat screen television, linens, mirror, towels, smoke detector to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the fitness center, massage. Discover all Everett (MA) has to offer by making Encore Boston Harbor Resort your base.priceline.com

name: Battery Wharf Hotel, Boston Waterfront
description: Located in the North End by Boston Harbor, Battery Wharf Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the New England Aquarium and offers a private water taxi to Logan International Airport. It features an on-site Exhale Spa. Each contemporary guest room at The Battery Wharf Hotel and Spa is equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a hardwood desk and a Nespresso coffee machine. The bathroom has a walk-in shower and vanity mirror with bathrobes. The on-site gym features a variety of cardio machines open 24 hours. The Battery Wharf Hotel is located right on the Boston Harbor Walk with a Maritime Museum on-site. The TD Garden is 0.5 mi away, Faneil Hall Marketplace is 0.2 mi away, The Boston Opera House is 1.7 mi away, while the Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum is 0.7 mi away from the hotel.

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: Located in downtown Boston, this luxury hotel is adjacent to the Prudential Center and 1.8 miles from Fenway Park. It features a seasonal rooftop pool and spacious rooms with a 58-inch flat-screen TV. The Colonnade Hotel is a 7-minute walk from Symphony Hall and across from Prudential Train Station. Harvard Yard and Logan International Airport are both a 15-minute drive away. An iPod docking station is one of the modern amenities in every room at The Colonnade. All rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows and a Keurig coffee maker. Sleek black and white décor and a seating area complete each room. Free access to the state-of-the-art fitness center is provided to all guests. The helpful concierge service can help arrange travel details.
